snippet.title: Darkest Dungeon II - Inhuman Bondage DLC Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
#darkestdungeon #darkestdungeon2 #inhumanbondage

“Tortured and reclusive, this man is more dangerous than he seems.”

Darkest Dungeon II's second paid DLC, Inhuman Bondage is available now!

Plunge your stagecoach into the long-forgotten Catacombs beneath the Kingdom and face a corrosive, oozing threat! This DLC introduces a new mini-region to Darkest Dungeon II, along with a fresh faction of enemies. Fight through these putrescent piles of slime to obtain unique combat items and trinkets to modify your heroes and gain the upper hand. 

Unleash the beast within! The Abomination makes his return to the Darkest Dungeon series. This reclusive alchemist comes with a unique battle mechanic, allowing him to transform into a fearsome monstrosity - at the risk of spiraling stress!

Get Inhuman Bondage on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3205310/Darkest_Dungeon_II__Inhuman_Bondage/ 
Get Inhuman Bondage on Epic Game Store: https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/darkest-dungeon-2--inhuman-bondage
Website: https://www.darkestdungeon.com
Discord: https://discord.gg/darkestdungeon
Twitter: https://twitter.com/DarkestDungeon
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DarkestDungeon
Instagram: https://instagram.com/redhookstudios
Bluesky: https://bsky.app/profile/darkestdungeon.bsky.social
